text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Ayabeee… Have you seen a little 
elephant mascot lying around?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: … The one that was on your tote bag?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I found it in the dorm's hallway 
so I left it on your desk.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Aaah, really? You're a lifesaver,
Ayabeeee!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you remembered it was 
on my bag, did you?♪

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
N-No… Uhh, anyone would remember 
that ugly elephant…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Muuu～ But that's what's cute about it～!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I know, I'll give you one as thanks!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: We can have matching bags♪ Yeah?
